Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Overland Drive, south of the Khelleva Stables.
Room.LongDescription: The Khelleva Stables run east for nearly two regular-sized city blocks. You've never seen so many horses in your life. On the south side of the road is the Odgen Family Villa, a small, but very powerful family who actually runs most of the town. They say money corrupts, but if you're the one with the money, you won't hear any complaints.
